about_the_game:
THE WASTE – a brutal and stylish action game about bloody street shootouts and survival in a city after a global collapse, where authority has fallen, and crime thrives. Two factions fight for control over the city, its resources, and survivors.

🔥 Criminal Chaos and the Struggle for Survival

Welcome to Nova-City – a metropolis where the law no longer matters. Here, everyone is on their own, and only strength, cunning, and good weapons will help you survive. Money, reputation, and the right to stay alive – you will have to earn them or take them by force.

🔫 Realistic Combat System

✔️ Explosive gameplay with dynamic, lifelike shooting
✔️ Realistic ballistics and impactful weapon recoil
✔️ Brutal shootouts with a high level of violence

🌆 A City That Lives by Its Own Rules

Explore Nova-City: from gang-infested slums to elite skyscrapers where dark deals take place. There are no heroes here – only predators and prey.

👥 The Choice is Yours

🔹 Play solo or in co-op
🔹 Develop your reputation and playstyle
🔹 Gather gear and upgrade your arsenal
🔹 Earn, survive, and find your own path

🔥 THE WASTE is...

💀 An immersive shooter with a deep atmosphere
💀 Hardcore gameplay with no compromises
💀 Style, blood, concrete, and crime

⚡ Your journey starts here. Are you ready to survive?

🚀 Add to your wishlist and be among the first to dive into the game!

content_descriptors.notes: Due to its graphic nature and realistic depiction, this game is intended for mature audiences. It contains scenes of violence, including shootings and killing other players, as these elements are an integral part of progression in the game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4430 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 2GB / AMD Radeon R7 370 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10, 64-bit Windows 11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5-1600 / Intel Core i5-7600K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 6GB or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
